extension.description:
Movie Sets Library for skins / skinners and Manager for users
Library Mode, Show dialog info.
Add this in your [B]keymaps/keyboard.xml[/B] and use (eg: [B]I + O[/B]) for open info. <MyVideoLibrary> <keyboard> ... <!-- if selected item is set show custom info. --> [B]<o mod="i">RunScript(script.moviesets,moviesetinfo)</o>[/B] </keyboard> </MyVideoLibrary>
